data.name: Duel Maker - Guilty Gear
data.description:
Heaven or Hell

In this Kata, imagine a fighting game where you need to create an ```ID``` system using numbers from ```0 to 9``` so each player can choose the fighter and begin the duel. Pretty simple, right!? Each character is arranged like the image below, the first portrait being ```ID = 0``` and the last one, ```ID = 9```.

The task is to ```return``` a ```String``` with the Player 1 character’s name ```"VS"``` Player 2 character’s name. In case both players choose the same character, an extra ```'*'``` text will be added to ```Player 2``` character’s name. This symbol refers to the alternative color. ``` Example A: "Sol Badguy VS Ky Kiske" ``` ``` Example B: "Sol Badguy VS Sol Badguy*" ```

The Fighter's names are in this order:

``` Potemkin, Chipp Zanuff, Sol Badguy, Axl Low, Millia Rage, May, Kliff Undersn, Ky Kiske, Zato-ONE, Dr. Baldhead ```

Let's Rock

Consider:

``` There won’t be negative numbers or higher than 9. ``` ``` The final result can’t have spaces at the beginning or the end. ```
